meanings.definition: A line or sequence of people or vehicles awaiting their turn.
meanings.sent1: The queuing at the grocery store was long but moved quickly.
meanings.sent2: I joined the queuing at the bus stop to wait for my turn.
meanings.sent3: The queuing for the roller coaster was so long that I fell asleep standing up.
meanings.sent4: The queuing of cars on the highway resembled a colorful ribbon stretching into the distance.
meanings.sent5: The queuing outside the concert venue was a sea of excited fans eagerly anticipating the show.

meanings.definition: The act of forming or joining a line or sequence.
meanings.sent1: Queuing is necessary to maintain order at the movie theater.
meanings.sent2: Her queuing at the bank was efficient and quick.
meanings.sent3: The queuing for the buffet turned into a chaotic food race.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, strategic queuing of moves can lead to victory.
meanings.sent5: The queuing of students outside the classroom door was a daily routine.
